str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To commit adultery, not only of a married woman but of a married man. From moichos; to commit adultery.
